con:testCase.name: BadCases-DEV-CorruptTransactions-Debit
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests GUI-Services for failed transactions from camt054 debit
2019-05-28- MG: Additional implement in test-step: _Groovy Script-CreateMSISDN generate and set in properties msisdns for ocs.deduct or ngocs.ajustment error dependend of ocs-setting.

con:property.con:name: outSetting
con:property.con:value: Not found any known ocs-setting for brand: - 1

con:request.name: 6260P_chargeCustomer-OnDemandSMS
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID-OCS-Error-98800006}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestCase#Amount}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND_SMS</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:-->
</cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 6270P_chargeCustomer-Monthly
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID-PPIT-Error}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestCase#Amount}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>MONTHLY</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:-->
</cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 6430N_skipCurrentCamt054Action
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:skipCurrentCamt054Action>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-2-Debit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test skip transaction for camt054 ID = ${#TestCase#Camt054ID-2-Debit}</comment>\r </v1:skipCurrentCamt054Action>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 6440N_writeOffCamt054Transaction
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:writeOffCamt054Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-3-ClawBack}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test write back transaction for camt054ID=Test skip transaction for camt054 ID = ${#TestCase#Camt054ID-2-Debit}</comment>\r </v1:writeOffCamt054Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
